segments.text: I observe the scene in this bright kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on polishing the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems content in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is filling up and spilling over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't reacted at all to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes wait nearby on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the cabinet is open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the unstable stool to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping; he might tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, hopeful for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief is kind of cute, in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside feels tense with all these risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry an accident is inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR
